title: Anyone from riot please
body:
To whom it may concern at riot hq:

So, I've been playing many years now, and I very much enjoy of both your games and services you've provided. Although there is one thing that has always bothered me. I've never had an actual good computer to play on and with these current updates all the things I have to use poor and hold me back from improving. I am too busy with school and sports to get a job and even though I am too busy I stilled applied to the few places around (no luck) If you could perhaps send me a computer to use or borrow until I am able to get a job and get my own that would mean the world to me. I love you guys and honestly I don't expect much but a funny response to this. anyways thanks for the years of enjoyment.

Sincerly: Lance, age 16

replies.body:
Oh buddy I feel ya. My desktop died a bit ago and my older laptop can barely run anything now as is. I can't really help on the new computer front, but we might be able to adjust a few things here and there to make it a little easier to run League. 

Open your client settings, and try turning on **"low-spec mode**". Test it out in a practice game and let me know if it helps out!

P.S. I may not be able to help with a new pc, but how about a dancin' poro?
